Looking for the latest in free streaming and movie trailers? We’ve got you covered with daily updates, smooth navigation every new release.

Key Features:

- Watch HD movie trailers anytime
- Discover new releases and upcoming hits
- Fast and easy to use – no sign-in required

This app is designed for true movie lovers who want quick access to trailers and updates without any hassle. Perfect for staying up to date with new movies and blockbusters in one place.

HappyMood – Discover Games Made for You

Are you a true gamer looking for one place to explore everything about games? HappyMoods is your ultimate companion! With a huge database of games, you can easily search, discover, and enjoy all the details you need in one simple app.
Explore a Massive Library HappyMood Browse through a wide range of games across different styles and categories. Whether you love action, adventure, puzzle, or strategy, HappyMods brings everything together in one place.
Watch Trailers & Gameplay Before playing, get a real taste of the game! Watch trailers and gameplay videos to see exactly what the game looks like.
Save Your Favorites HappyMood Build your own personalized collection of favorite games. Add the ones you love and come back to them anytime.
Track Games You Like Never lose track of a game again. Follow the games you’re interested in and keep them organized in your list.
Choose Your Mood Not sure what to play? Select your mood and HappyMod will recommend games that match how you feel at that moment. Fun, relaxing, scary, or exciting – there’s always a game waiting for you.
Test Your Knowledge Think you know everything about games? Try our quiz and challenge yourself with fun questions to see how much of a gaming expert you are.
All-in-One Gaming Experience HappyMood makes it easy for you to discover new games, keep track of your favorites, enjoy videos, and even test your knowledge. It’s everything a gamer needs – simple, clear, and always fun.
With HappyMod, finding the perfect game has never been easier.

Relax and dive into a great story! Enjoy our bestselling series! Millions of readers can’t get enough of our library of unputdownable novels. Dive into an extensive collection of audiobooks, ebook novels, and immersive fiction stories. New chapters and interactive stories are added every day.

BINGE-READ / SNACK-READ
* Unstoppable addictive stories span multiple seasons, and new chapters released daily!
* 15 minutes per chapter, read at your own pace, whenever wherever you are, any time you want.

A LIBRARY FOR EVERY DESIRE
* Fall in love with our epic novels and unlimited fiction series.
* 400 ebooks to choose from, featuring chat fiction and other immersive elements
* Exclusive online novels from best-selling authors
* Follow your favorite books and writers as we craft a never-ending story.

A REVOLUTIONARY READING EXPERIENCE
* More immersive, interactive, and engaging than a traditional book.
* Turn on/off music, ambiance, and sound effects.
* Watch your favorite characters' conversation unfold in text messages too!
* Offline reading anytime, anywhere.

STORIES IN BOTH BOOK/AUDIOBOOK FORMATS
* Read or Listen? Whatever your mood and the situation calls for.
* Enjoy stories anywhere, any time.

BOOK CLUB
* Join the discussion online with our vibrant Book Club community
* Join our Facebook group: https://bit.ly/3j9af5g
* Follow us on Instagram: @galatea.stories

DARK MODE / NIGHT READING
* Turn on the Dark Mode for cozy night reading

HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT WRITERS
* Support Galatea writers by purchasing chapters.
* For unlimited access to all of our stories, we have subscription packages!

LANGUAGES
* English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, and Portuguese… more on the way.

The immersive reading app Galatea was developed by Inkitt (Free Novels Inc.)
By using Galatea, you agree to our Terms of Use and Community Guidelines (https://getgalatea.com/terms/) and to our Privacy Policy (https://getgalatea.com/privacy)

Dofu App – For True Football Fans.

Stay connected to the heartbeat of football like never before. Dofu App delivers lightning-fast updates, powerful insights, and everything a true fan needs — all in one place.

- Lightning-Fast Match Alerts

Goals, penalties, substitutions — get notified instantly as the action unfolds.

- All Fixtures at Your Fingertips

Browse today’s matches, tomorrow’s derbies, and future clashes with easy reminders.

- Smart Match Insights

Go beyond the scoreline with live stats on possession, shots, fouls, and momentum.

- Player Performance Tracker

Follow every move of your favorite stars with detailed player data and records.

- League & Tournament Dashboards

Stay on top of tables across global competitions at a single glance.

- Prediction Stats

Get data-driven forecasts on match outcomes, powered by form, head-to-head records, and team momentum.

With Dofu App, every match feels bigger, every stat sharper, and every moment unforgettable. Whether you’re tracking your club, your country, or the global stage, this is where football lives.

Disclaimer: Predictions in this app are based on statistical analysis and past performance data. They are provided for informational and entertainment purposes only and should not be considered guaranteed outcomes. This app does not offer or promote betting or gambling. We do not support or promote any kind of live sports streaming.

- Discover Now Playing / Popular / Top / Trending / Upcoming / Best Of Years Movies & TV Shows
- Quick search for movies and TV series by title
- Watch trailers and other videos
- Create your own watchlists for movies
- TV series calendar
- Detailed information about movies and TV series
- Rate Movies/TV shows in app and explore other rating
- Complete list of episodes for TV series with complete information about the episodes
- Search for services where you can buy, rent, stream films and series
- Watch videos (HD fullsreen) about movies and TV shows without leaving the app
- Profiles of actors with their full filmography
- Simple and user-friendly application interface
- Browsing history
- No account required

Disclaimer: 
In the application, you cannot watch films and series for free, but you can find in the application a complete description of the series and films and also the service on which you can watch them.

All movies information and images are from TMDB.org licensed under CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/

This app uses the TMDb API but is not endorsed or certified by TMDb: https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use

Introducing Match Score, the essential app for every football enthusiast. With Match Score, you can stay effortlessly connected to the world of football, accessing a wealth of information right at your fingertips. From match schedules to results, Match Score ensures you're always in the loop.

Key Features:


Upcoming Matches & Results:
Never miss a game again! Match Score provides a comprehensive schedule of all upcoming matches, allowing you to plan your viewing in advance. Additionally, you can easily check the results of past matches, keeping you up to date with the latest developments in the football world.

Favorites:
Track your favorite teams and matches with ease. Match Score's Favorites feature lets you select the teams and matches that matter most to you. Receive real-time notifications when these matches are about to start, ensuring you never miss a moment of the action.

Predictions:
Enhance your game-day experience with expert insights and predictions. Match Score offers detailed analysis and predictions for today's matches, helping you stay informed and engaged. Whether you're a casual fan or a seasoned follower, these predictions add an extra layer of excitement to your football experience.

Stay effortlessly connected to the football world with Match Score. Download the app today and make it your go-to source for all football updates and information.

Silly Steal MemeRot: Escape
Step into the world of Escape from the Steal MemeRot, a visually stunning puzzle adventure inspired by the charm and mystery of classic stop-motion animation. In this hauntingly beautiful game, you explore a surreal town stitched together from fabric, thread, and forgotten memories.

As a curious thread-bound traveler, you'll navigate eerie environments, solve intricate puzzles, and piece together the story behind a place where every corner hides a secret. With an atmosphere reminiscent of beloved stop-motion films and dark fairy tales, Escape from the Garden Ville offers a truly unique and immersive experience.

Key Features:

Handcrafted visuals inspired by stop-motion animation

Engaging environmental puzzles and interactive storytelling

A mysterious world made of yarn, cloth, and shadow

Rich, atmospheric sound design and original soundtrack

A compelling narrative filled with secrets and surprises

Fans of narrative-driven adventures and distinctive art styles will find themselves drawn into a world where every thread matters.

Inkitt Brings Stories to Life

Join Inkitt for the Community 
Dive into Inkitt, where stories, books, and novels come to life in a global community of readers and writers. Our readers are the trendsetters. Every day, millions of readers come to Inkitt to discover the next bestseller. Get feedback on your work, share your favorite science fiction or adventure stories, and explore a treasure trove of fantasy and romance novels. 

Unlimited Reading, A Library of Indie Novels Awaits
Enjoy unlimited reading across genres you love. From steamy romance to thrilling adventure, or captivating fantasy to provocative romance, there’s something for everyone:
Discover indie novels from promising writers
Explore a new niche like mafia romances, fantasy adventures, or your favorite fanfiction
Download books to read offline anytime
Personalize your experience with customizable fonts and colors
Autoscroll while immersed in your favorite stories

Become the Next Blockbuster 
Inkitt is the world’s first reader-powered publisher, connecting readers with new books, captivating novels, and extraordinary stories. Our platform is home to romance, adventure, and fantasy gems waiting to be discovered. Indie authors who shine can gain opportunities for publication or adaptations, making their books accessible to fans worldwide.

With this app, everything Le Monde has to offer is in one place. 
- Keep up with the news via our homepage, curated by Le Monde in English journalists.
- All of “Le Monde in English” articles: reports, investigations, opinion pieces, and more.
- Our videos, photos, and infographics.

We’ve included a number of features to enhance your reading experience.
- Switch to dark mode or change your font to personalize your reading experience.
- Save the articles you want to read later.
- Pick your own sections to see the news that interests you.

Le Monde in English delivers in-depth and reliable news coverage on a wide-range of topics:
- News from France, Europe and the world.
- The latest news across our many sections: Environment, Business, Politics, Investigations, and more.
- Along with coverage on sports, technology, science, culture, and the arts.

When you subscribe to Le Monde in English, you are supporting an independent newsroom of over 530 journalists, and benefitting from unlimited access to Le Monde in English content, on the website and the app.

If you have any questions or encounter a technical issue, take a look at our FAQ to see if your question has already been answered, or reach out to our support team via “Report a problem” in the app settings.

General terms and conditions: https://moncompte.lemonde.fr/cgv-en

Read 7,000+ of the world’s most popular newspapers and magazines on your iPhone or iPad. Enjoy unlimited reading on up to 3 devices with a 7-day free trial of PressReader Premium. 
 
PressReader is the best way to read your favourite magazines and newspapers in one place—from local stories to global news, and everything in between. Download complete issues and switch between the original print view and a mobile-optimized text view. Bring it all to life with Auto-Translate to over 30 languages or listen to stories with our text-to-speech features.  
 
Subscribe to PressReader Premium to get unlimited access to most publications in the catalog or purchase single issues of your favorite title. Individual subscriptions for some publications are also available. To access PressReader without a subscription, visit one of our HotSpot partners. 
  
“PressReader delivers an authentic multi-platform newspaper-reading experience” – TNW

“A sleeping giant in the digital media landscape” – INC. 
 
“If you love newspapers but hate inky fingers and creepy delivery people, you might be interested in taking a gander at PressReader” – TECHCRUNCH

Vous êtes un parieur expérimenté ou un passionné de turf ? C’est l’appli qu’il vous faut: 
- La base de données hippique la plus riche  

- Des filtres intuitifs pour un papier pertinent

- Des pronos grâce à des journalistes experts sur le terrain 7j/7

- Les infos en temps réel en direct de l’hippodrome

- Le replay des courses 



 Faites le papier rapidement et simplement des courses de trot, de galop et de plat. 

"Le top pour faire le papier"

"Application qui me permet de composer le tiercé et couplés et de me référer aux courses passées"

"J’adore la publication des résultats ultra rapide"

"Une appli top. La sélection de chevaux en fonction de la course est facile."

"J’utilise cette application depuis des années et elle était pour moi la meilleure application de turf qui existe."







FACILE A PRENDRE EN MAIN

Dès l’écran d’accueil : 

Retrouvez le programme des courses du jour. 

Accédez aux courses à venir 

Retrouvez les courses de la veille avec les replays

Avec les filtres intuitifs, comparez les chevaux et personnalisez votre analyse facilement : hippodrome, distance, spécialités (trot, galop, etc.), surface, autostart, déferrage, handicaps, œillères, et plus 




ANALYSE COMPLÈTE DES COURSES

Profitez de la base de données Paris-Turf. Consultez les informations clés : hippodrome, numéro de course, réunion, heure de départ, allocation, corde, catégorie, chevaux, jockeys, entraîneurs, etc.


Explorez chaque cheval avec des détails sur ses performances. Découvrez les classements, cotes, distances, temps, et commentaires des journalistes Paris-Turf. Tout sur les courses hippiques: partants,cotes, interviews exclusives, rapports probables…


Pronostics Experts: Laissez-vous guider par nos spécialistes pour des pronostics PMU et Quinté fiables. Bénéficiez de l’exhaustivité de la base ParisTurf


Résultats Instantanés: Suivez les résultats des courses en temps réel, avec des rapports définitifs et des statistiques approfondies.




En créant votre compte: 

- Ajoutez des notes sur un cheval

- Soyez alerté sur votre  cheval favori quand il part



Avec l’abonnement, accédez : 

- À plus de filtres, 

- Aux interviews de nos experts

- Aux pronos de nos experts 





UN COMPAGNON QUINTÉ, TIERCÉ, QUARTÉ INÉGALÉ

- Paris Hippiques Simplifiés: Qu'il s'agisse du Tiercé, Quarté ou Quinté, ParisTurf Live vous offre les outils nécessaires pour parier avec confiance.

- Stratégies Gagnantes: Apprenez des meilleurs avec des analyses et pronostics détaillés.


D’une course à réclamer aux Groupes 1 (Prix d’Amérique, Prix de Cornulier, Prix de l’Arc de Triomphe, Prix de Diane, Prix du Jockey Club, Grand Steeple Chase de Paris, Grand Prix de Paris) en passant par les Listed Races, faites tout simplement le papier comme un expert. 




TOUJOURS À JOUR

- Mises à Jour en Temps Réel: Restez informé de l'état des terrains et des dernières nouvelles des courses.

- Support Client Réactif: Notre équipe est à votre disposition pour toute question ou assistance technique. 



Rejoignez la communauté des experts avec ParisTurf Live – votre allié pour des paris hippiques stratégiques et informés.




UNE SUGGESTION

Vous aimez Paris Turf ? Soutenez-nous en déposant un avis et 5 étoiles

Aidez-nous à améliorer notre application en nous écrivant à contact@paris-turf.com 




Politique de Confidentialité : https://www.paris-turf.com/charte-de-confidentialite

Features

AI-powered movie and show suggestions based on what you’ve just watched

Personalized recommendations tailored to your mood and preferred genres

Trending and popular titles to help you stay up-to-date

Detailed metadata: ratings, synopsis, cast, release dates

Powerful search across all movies & series

Watchlist: save and manage your favorites

Retrouvez l’intégralité du journal papier accompagné du cahier quotidien Eco & Entreprises, ainsi que les cahiers hebdomadaires, les suppléments mensuels et des hors-séries.

Le Monde à consulter partout :
- L’édition du jour disponible dès 13 heures, heure de parution à Paris
- La possibilité d’accéder aux 30 dernières éditions du journal
- En avion ou dans le train, consultez les éditions chargées, même hors connexion…
- Téléchargement anticipé : permet de commencer à lire le journal avant la fin du téléchargement

Une navigation tactile et intuitive :
- La mise en page est adaptée à l'écran de l'iPhone ou de l'iPad, pour un confort de lecture unique
- Le mode déconnecté vous permet de profiter des contenus, même en avion
- L'accès direct à M, le magazine du Monde, aux suppléments de votre journal ainsi qu'à des hors-séries.

Abonnez-vous directement depuis l'application :
- Téléchargez Le Monde en illimité sur votre iPhone/iPad
- Abonnement mensuel à partir de 12,99 €
- Profitez d’une semaine d’essai gratuit
- Le montant de l’abonnement est débité sur votre compte iTunes automatiquement à la confirmation de l’abonnement
- L’abonnement est automatiquement reconduit sauf si cette option est désactivée hors 24 heures précédant la fin de la période en cours
- L’abonnement et son renouvellement peuvent être gérés en vous rendant dans votre compte dans l’App Store après l’achat


Si vous avez une question, ou que vous rencontrez un problème technique, n’hésitez pas à consulter notre FAQ ou à nous écrire grâce à la rubrique «Aide » accessible dans les réglages de l’application.

Conditions générales de vente : https://moncompte.lemonde.fr/cgv

The world is complex, and changing fast. The Economist app unlocks independent reporting and news analysis from correspondents across the globe. With articles, podcasts, videos and more, our app is a simple way to understand big news developments and why they matter.

Now introducing The Economist Insider, a premium video offering available at launch for subscribers to The Economist. Join senior editors as they explain what's happening now—and what comes next.

What does The Economist cover?

With expert journalists around the world, The Economist reports on politics in America and around the world, as well as economics, business, science, technology and more. We connect the dots to explain the news today and implications for tomorrow.

Why choose The Economist app?

- Read global, fact-checked news reporting anywhere
- Listen to award-winning podcasts and audio articles
- Watch videos that distill big news 

Get access to independent news reporting on your terms:

- Catch up on the news quickly with The World in Brief 
- Enjoy early access to weekly edition, ahead of print
- Download articles for offline reading

Play news games to test your knowledge:

- Mini crossword: The Economist’s wordplay news puzzle
- Dateline history quiz: guess when news extracts were published 
- Pint-sized news quiz: have you been following the latest headlines?

Enjoy additional features:

- Bookmark news articles to read later
- Give news articles to friends and family
- Read news analysis easily with adjustable text size
- Toggle dark mode

See what The Economist subscribers say:

Daily Science News: Your Ultimate Science News App

Stay ahead in the world of science with Daily Science News, the best app for all your science news and articles!

Why Choose Daily Science News?

3. Top Sources: Get instant news gathered from the most reputable science news sources.

5. Personalized Feed: Select the science categories you're interested in and turn off the ones you're not.
6. Extensive Archive: Explore over 10,000 science news articles. Scroll through as much content as your device allows.
7. Bookmark Manager: Save and manage links to your favorite articles for future reference.
8. Regular Updates: Our dedicated team actively maintains and updates the app for an exceptional user experience.

Discover News Across Multiple Science Fields

Daily Science News covers sixteen major fields to ensure you're informed about all scientific advancements:

Space News: Stay updated on astronomy news, space discoveries, and missions.

Physics News: Learn about new experiments, research, and breakthroughs in physics.
Biology News: Discover advances in life sciences and biological research.
Chemistry News: Keep up with the latest findings in chemistry.
Mathematics News: Explore how mathematics is used in research and problem-solving.
Health News: Stay informed about medical science, health news, and medical breakthroughs.
Environment News: Learn about environmental concerns and Earth science developments.
Nanotechnology News: Get updates on the revolutionary science of nanotechnology.
Archaeology & Anthropology News: Read breaking news for archaeologists and anthropologists.
Earth Science News: Find out about the latest in geology, geophysics, and other Earth sciences.
Engineering News, Genetics News, Industrial News, Other Science News, Social Science News

Why Daily Science News is the Best Science News App

1. All-in-One Science App: Unlike other science apps, we cover a wide range of scientific fields so you won't miss out on any important updates.

Help your children love reading with age-appropriate books that grow with them. Improve literacy and develop a lifelong passion for literature.

For Everyone:

Scott Fitzgerald, "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "Moby Dick" by Herman Melville, "The Republic" by Plato, "Wealth of Nations" by Adam Smith, "The Ethics of Aristotle" by Aristotle, "Jane Eyre" by Charlotte Brontë, "Ulysses" by James Joyce, "Great Expectations" by Charles Dickens, "The Brothers Karamazov" by Fyodor Dostoevsky, "The Autobiography of Benjamin Franklin" by Benjamin Franklin, "On Liberty" by John Stuart Mill, "The Count of Monte Cristo" by Alexandre Dumas, "Meditations" by Marcus Aurelius, "The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" by Arthur Conan Doyle, "Kim" by Rudyard Kipling.
